Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide exceptional value. This product embodies quality and functionality, making it an excellent choice for anyone looking to enhance their experience. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value. To make this opportunity accessible, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $150. I'm confident that once you experience its capabilities, you'll see the true value it offers. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or need further details about the product. I look forward to hearing from you soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
